Uses of Class
android.net.LocalSocketAddress

Packages that use LocalSocketAddress
android.net Classes that help with network access, beyond the normal java.net.* APIs. 
 

Uses of LocalSocketAddress in android.net
 

Methods in android.net that return LocalSocketAddress

          Retrieves the name that this socket is bound to, if any.

          Obtains the socket's local address
